page.title: 05Road Transport
page.content: In{Costock}there is one{bus service} which runs every two hours.It is a{ {Trent Motor Traction Co.}service which runs between{Nottingham}and{ {Loughborough. There is a mini bus co. called {Soar {Valley Bus Service}which runs on a Tuesday and serves mainly old people and others without cars.The mini bus goes to{East Leake}and{Rempstone.} People can walk at least one and a half miles to East Leake to catch an hourly service to either { {Loughborough }or {Nottingham. Another{Trent}service passes through{ {Rempstone}and{Wymeswold}and then on to {Loughborough.} Most families have{two cars}because fathers have to drive long distances to work,while mothers need cars to take children to nursery,to go shopping or to work.
